Лучше чем КС го,куча деталей на картах ето класно!
Гораздо лучше cs:go, не только из-за меньшего количества читеров(по крайней мере я не встречал ни одного), но и стрельба как по мне гораздо лучше проработана. Дед лучше
Eskileri anmak için güzel bir oyun eski zamanları hatırlatıyor o ortamlar o yıllar o arkadaşlıklar...
Overall amazing game, plenty of fun different game modes, good servers and amazing people.
"Ты будешь страдать" говорили они, а я не верил... бл#%ь как же я ошибался

经常不受控制自己跑啊 拉都拉不回来

The game is still alive after all this years, its still amazing you can find people playing this game.
You can have alot of fun on community servers such as death run, zombie escape, jail break as well as surf, KZ and bhop servers!
Game is not alive as it used to be but it's definitely not dead, I recommend buying this game if you like this kind of games :)
По атмосфере и механике стрельбы это моя любимая часть кс.
esta bueno para jugar con amigos
Todo el mundo se queja de este CS pero es un clásico y el mejor para mi, de cuando todo era mas simple y no se jugaba para ver quien tenia el skin mas caro, sino para divertirse o pasar el rato.
Das spiel ist geil und macht spaß
This game in my opinion is an absolute classic! I use to play this when I was a little boy
source, хорошая игра. Даже через время приятно зайти в неё и пофанится
Игра хорошая, играй с читами не забанят (ПРОВЕРЕНО)
golden oldie, great game but not recommended because it's surpassed by newer version CS:GO.

Играл все детство в пиратку, решил купить по итогу. Игра достойна своих денег, для 2004 года она выглядит максимально достойно, не сильно требовательная, что позволит играть даже на слабеньком пк. Еще можно скачать скинчики, так игра становится еще красочней. В общем всем рекомендую.
Be honest with yourself, who else bought this just for GMod?
Güzel bir oyun.Sadece arada sırada hile geliyor. Onun dışında çok güzel bir FPS rekabet oyunu.

This game is actually better than csgo.
It's honestly refreshing how many maps there are.
There is so much i can say but i need to play more.
eski ama guzel bir oyun vakit geçirmek için bire bir..

This is still a great game, all in all its not about trading or about having the most fancy skin on your weapon because that doesn't prove a players skill hand-eye coordination is key and this game is the king of that.

This game changed my life. I went from having no friends at school and being a nerdy loser, to everyone loving me and wanting to be me. Because of this game I’ve become extremely sexy. I have no more acne, I’ve put on pounds of muscle, and my hair and beard are the fullest they’ve been in years. I even met my wife through this game. Thank you, CSS, for making me a better person.
для тех у кого не тянет КС.ГО
